body: Well, can't blame the artist, he needs support to continue this story.

Aside from the update slack and obvious plot, the art is great so that's one good thing about this piece.

I still can't quite get whether this chick is reluctant, forced, or is absolutely willing to engage with those dudes. Cuz why tf would she tell them where the family is staying if she wanted to cut ties with them after getting shamlessly fucked in the beach? After the bath, she would probably just join them and neglect her family, who's probably too tired to look for her. Except for her son, and I think he's gonna find out or something... But well... That remains to be answered in a month or two... Or more!

I can go on about this, but I'd rather fap.
1) again with the 1-2 page update 2) so the husband fot game huh 3) again plug and play NTR shame

it's been so long   
FOR FUCKS SAKE
I can't believe he's making progress lol
